evidence.claim: The Spark utilizes AWS for its cloud services.
They ensure HIPAA compliance for their health-tech applications.
The Spark implements FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
They utilize Kafka for real-time data streaming and integration.
The Spark supports using X12 transaction sets within their EHR integrations.

icp.icp_reason: The Spark's focus on HIPAA compliance and X12 standard indicates suitability for healthcare data exchange.
matched_use_cases: data exchange with payers and providers
